description.value:
Requirements You are wielding your grafted gun

You unload your entire clip of ammunition into a target, providing both power and a chance to quickly reload as your enemy takes cover. Make up to three ranged Strikes with your grafted gun, reducing the multiple attack penalty of each shot to -3 instead of the usual -5. You may not make more Strikes than you currently have capacity in your grafted gun, but you may @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to reload as a free action at the end of the attack.
